explore_all_new_maratha_attire: Explore All Our New Maratha Attire
about_us_content: At Brand Maratha, we blend tradition with modern style. Inspired by India’s rich heritage, we offer premium ethnic and contemporary apparel crafted with authentic artistry. Our mission is to celebrate culture through timeless designs while ensuring quality and customer satisfaction. Discover fashion that tells a story—where heritage meets elegance.
inspire_and_be_inspired: Shop directly from Instagram's trending favorites styles
modal_content: Get the latest updates straight to your inbox.
address-full: Brandmaratha Studio Pvt. Ltd. Insignia, S K Bole Road, Dadar (W), Mumbai - 400028, MH.
subscribe: Sign up to get first dibs on new arrivals, sales, exclusive content, events and more!
who_we_are_content: Brand Maratha is a celebration of Maharashtra’s rich cultural heritage and traditional craftsmanship.
who_we_are_content_1: We are a premier online destination offering authentic and stylish Maharashtrian attire and accessories for men, women, and kids. Our mission is to keep our traditions alive while making them accessible to everyone around the globe.
our_journey_content: Brand Maratha was established in 2023 with the dream of bringing the elegance and pride of Maharashtrian culture to your doorstep. Inspired by the timeless traditions of Maharashtra, we curate the finest collection of ethnic fashion that blends heritage with contemporary trends.
happy_clients_content: Hear what they say about us
uncompromised_quality_content: At Brand Maratha, quality is our hallmark. We handpick the finest fabrics, intricate designs, and traditional techniques to ensure every product meets the highest standards.
our_mission_content: To preserve, promote, and celebrate the vibrant culture of Maharashtra by delivering premium-quality traditional fashion with a modern touch. We aim to support local artisans and connect people with their roots through our exquisite collection.
Touch_para: If you’ve got great products your making or looking to work with us then drop us a line.
Privacy_para: The Company Private Limited and each of their respective subsidiary, parent and affiliated companies is deemed to operate this Website (“we” or “us”) recognizes that you care how information about you is used and shared. We have created this Privacy Policy to inform you what information we collect on the Website, how we use your information and the choices you have about the way your information is collected and used. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. Your use of the Website indicates that you have read and accepted our privacy practices, as outlined in this Privacy Policy.
Exchange_para: Our exchange policy allows customers to return products within 30 days of purchase for an exchange, provided the items are in their original condition and packaging. Please retain your receipt as proof of purchase. Certain items may not be eligible for exchange due to hygiene or safety reasons. For further details, contact our customer service team.
